channel.title: Comments on: Zenora.me Review – Is it Legit or Scam

item.title: By: Hardeywarlex
item.dc:creator: Hardeywarlex
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/zenora-me-review/#comment-1702">Owoade Jeremiah</a>.
The investment platform (Zenora) turn out to be scam, please stay away from it.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Owoade Jeremiah.

The investment platform (Zenora) turn out to be scam, please stay away from it.

item.title: By: Dav
item.dc:creator: Dav
item.description: If I have 4k on the account and I want to pay out to the other client, can I withdraw the 4k and payout or I have to pay out the 4k with my personal money and leave 4k I earned on the platform
item.content:encoded: If I have 4k on the account and I want to pay out to the other client, can I withdraw the 4k and payout or I have to pay out the 4k with my personal money and leave 4k I earned on the platform

item.description:
In reply to <a href="/zenora-me-review/#comment-1284">George</a>.
The referral will have to be an active member which means they must join matrix 1
item.content:encoded:

The referral will have to be an active member which means they must join matrix 1
